caption:
“The heavens declare the glory of God.” — Psalm 19:1

Reflection:
The stars speak without sound, their light a hymn to the Infinite. Every spark in the sky is a syllable of praise.

Commentary:
This verse reminds us that creation itself is revelation. Nature becomes scripture for the soul willing to listen with wonder.

#VeniPublishing #VeniFaithful #DivineLight #GodInNature #WonderAndWorship #ContemplativeChristianity #SacredStillness #BibleVerseOfTheDay #JesusChrist
